# Codigo que venia con el dataset

```{r}
d1=read.table("D:/Documentos/Especialidad/DataMining/Tarea2/Dataset/student-mat.csv",sep=";",header=TRUE)
d2=read.table("D:/Documentos/Especialidad/DataMining/Tarea2/Dataset/student-por.csv",sep=";",header=TRUE)

d3=merge(d1,d2,by=c("school","sex","age","address","famsize","Pstatus","Medu","Fedu","Mjob","Fjob","reason","nursery","internet"))
print(nrow(d3)) # 382 students
```

# Exportar a csv

```{r}
write.csv(d3, "estudiantes.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
